mapper.select: SELECT LOG.MBR_ID id , MBR_NAME name , BIRTHDAY birthday , PHONE phoneNumber , LOG.LOCATION_ID locationId , LOG.TIME time , BEACON_ID beaconId , MARGIN_LEFT marginLeft , MARGIN_TOP marginTop FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM LOCATION_LOG WHERE MBR_ID IN ( SELECT MBR_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MBR_NAME like '%' || #{name} || '%' ) ORDER BY LOCATION_LOG_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM=1 ) LOG , LOCATION , MEMBER WHERE LOG.LOCATION_ID = LOCATION.LOCATION_ID AND LOG.MBR_ID = MEMBER.MBR_ID
